Home.title: Hi, I'm Alejandra Rivera Rinc√≥n.
Home.description: In every aspect and process of the project I strive to exceed the client's expectations. I am always looking for new ways to improve and to evolve.

About.title: About Me
description: I have completed a degree in Systems Engineering with training in software development, including web applications. I am passionate about researching and understanding each project thoroughly, allowing me to create detailed work plans. I strive to execute each stage with dedication, ensuring both design and performance are optimal.

Additionally, I have a keen interest in 3D architectural design, which focuses on creating realistic representations of buildings. I always seek innovation in every project, enabling me to effectively integrate technology and design.
Every day, I am committed to giving my best and continuing to learn to expand my knowledge and skills in this exciting field.

projects.name: My Web Portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio showcases my web design and development projects. Explore this site, an example of my work that combines creativity and functionality to deliver effective digital experiences.

projects.name: One Leadenhall Building
projects.description: This model is a representation of a building in the city of London, which was a good challenge as there were no architectural plans or sufficient current photos available.

projects.name: York House Building
projects.description: This model is a representation of a building in the city of London. This building was the first project I did when I was just learning to use Blender tools.
